nodes.text: A gas giant was located in the Unknown Regions. The gas giant planet had three sets of planetary rings and a thick, roiling atmosphere. An excursion liner of the Chiss Ascendancy's Boadil family ventured too close to the planet, and the starship's captain ignored the engineers' warnings of electronic interference from the planet's magnetic fields.

The liner was caught in the planet's gravity well, and the Chiss patrol ship Boco, under the command of Senior Commander Thrawn, attempted to rescue it. With the assistance of Senior Captain Ziara's patrol cruiser Parala, Thrawn lightened the liner by shooting off its luxury wings, pulling the liner out of the gravity well with tractor beams and saving all eight thousand passengers aboard.
The planet first appeared, in a flashback, in the novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, written by Timothy Zahn and released in 2020.
